body: Actually this document is really old. It was written when WSL only has `root` user. For now, `/home/username/bitcoin` should be better than `/usr/src/bitcoin`. Could you try to re-compile it at your home directory again and see if it would work?
@ken2812221 Hi, thanks for the quick response. Sure, I'm going to try that now. Will let you know.
I think you can use the instructions from the master or 0.17.0 branch, since they are updated to bionic. Not sure if the 0.16.* ones are updated.
